Package eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.impl

Default implementations of the Flow Engine API with local and remote options.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AdvancePoolCreator The implementation of the pool creator function for the AdvancePools class.
CheckedDataStore A datastore wrapper which checks at each query whether the user is allowed to perform that operation.
CheckedEngineControl Wraps the given engine control object and for each call, it checks if the user has the appropriate rights.
HttpCommunicator Send and receive requests through HTTP or HTTPS, with none, basic or certificate authentication.
HttpDataStoreListener Utility class to parse and compose DataStore request coming as XML format and delegate it properly to an AdvanceDataStore object.
HttpEngineControlListener The listener for Engine control messages coming through the HTTP XML interface.
HttpRemoteDataStore A datastore which connects to a remote datastore via HTTP(s) and exchanges messages via XML.
HttpRemoteEngineControl An AdvanceEngineControl implementation which translates the API calls into XML message exchanges through a HTTP(s) channel.
JDBCDataStore A JDBC based remote datastore.
LocalDataStore The local realm object containing various tables.
LocalEngineControl A synchronized local flow engine control object storing data in local XML file.
 

Package eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.impl Description

Default implementations of the Flow Engine API with local and remote options.
